Package model.gameV2

Class Game

java.lang.Object
model.gameV2.Game
public class Game
extends java.lang.Object
Represents the "Game". Holds all necessary properties / objects for a game. Provides methods for interacting with the server, and gameplay as necessary.
Author:
Dennis, Josef

    • server

      public final ChatServer server

  • Constructor Details

    • Game

      public Game​(ChatServer server, Player firstPlayer)
      Creates a new Game
      Parameters:
      server - The server on which the game is played
      firstPlayer - The game.player who created the game (first game.player)

  • Method Details

    • getDiscardedCards

      public java.lang.String getDiscardedCards()
      Returns the discarded cards of this round.
      Returns:
      If there are discarded cards, a string which contains all discarded Cards of the round, otherwise a error message

    • isRunning

      public boolean isRunning()
      Returns if the game is running.
      Returns:
      "true" when the game is running, otherwise "false"

    • getStatus

      public void getStatus​(java.lang.String username)
      Displays the requesting game.player how many wins each game.player has.
      Parameters:
      username - The requesting game.player's username

    • addPlayer

      public void addPlayer​(Player newPlayer)
      Adds a new Player to the Game.
      Parameters:
      newPlayer - The new game.player

    • discardCard

      public void discardCard​(Card card)
      Adds a card to "discardedCards".
      Parameters:
      card - The discarded Card

    • getActivePlayerList

      public java.util.List<Player> getActivePlayerList()
      Returns the active game.player list.
      Returns:
      The "activePlayerList".

    • getActivePlayerByUsername

      public Player getActivePlayerByUsername​(java.lang.String playerName)
      Checks whether there is a game.player with the given username, if so it returns the game.player object, otherwise returns null.
      Parameters:
      playerName - The specified username.
      Returns:
      The game.player object if it exists, otherwise null.

    • getNextRoundActivePlayerList

      public java.util.List<Player> getNextRoundActivePlayerList()
      Returns the next round active game.player list.
      Returns:
      The "getNextRoundActivePlayerList".

    • setRoundWinsNeeded

      public int setRoundWinsNeeded()
      Determines the number of rounds that must be won to win the game depending on the number of players.
      Returns:
      The number of rounds that muse be won.

    • startGame

      public void startGame​(java.lang.String userName)
      Starts the Game. Checks if the game.player who requested to start the game is the same one, who created the game.
      Parameters:
      userName - The requesting game.player.

    • gameMove

      public void gameMove​(Player game.player)
      Starts a players game move. Checks if the deck is empty and whether it is the requesting game.player's turn. If the deck is empty it determines the round winner, and starts a new round.
      Parameters:
      game.player - The requesting Player.

    • playLeftCard

      public void playLeftCard​(java.lang.String username)
      Checks whether it's the requesting game.player's turn. If so calls / plays the left card on the players hand (cards(0)). Removes the discarded Card from the players hand.
      Parameters:
      username - The requesting Player.

    • playRightCard

      public void playRightCard​(java.lang.String username)
      Checks whether it's the requesting game.player's turn. If so calls / plays the right card on the players hand (cards(1)). Removes the discarded Card from the players hand.
      Parameters:
      username - The requesting Player.

    • playCard

      public void playCard​(Card playedCard, Player game.player)
      Notifies all players that the active game.player has played the playedCard. Ads the playedCard to the discardedCards List. Calls the play method of the playedCard.
      Parameters:
      playedCard - The played card.
      game.player - The active game.player.

    • playCardWithoutEffect

      public void playCardWithoutEffect​(Card playedCard, Player game.player)
      Notifies all players that the game.player has discarded a Card without an Effect. Ads the playedCard to the discardedCards List.
      Parameters:
      playedCard - The played / discarded card.
      game.player - The active game.player.

    • isDeckEmpty

      public boolean isDeckEmpty()
      Returns if the deck is empty.
      Returns:
      "true" if the deck is empty, "false" if the deck isn't.

    • chooseAnotherPlayer

      public void chooseAnotherPlayer​(java.lang.String username, java.lang.String chosenName)
      Checks whether it's the requesting game.player's turn. Checks if the chosen game.player is not the requesting game.player. If both are correct, it calls the correct completePlay function.
      Parameters:
      username - The requesting game.player.
      chosenName - The chosen game.player.

    • chooseAnyPlayer

      public void chooseAnyPlayer​(java.lang.String username, java.lang.String chosenName)
      Checks whether it's the requesting game.player's turn. If so, it calls the Princes completePlay method.
      Parameters:
      username - The requesting game.player.
      chosenName - The chosen game.player.

    • guessCard

      public void guessCard​(java.lang.String username, java.lang.String value)
      Checks whether it's the requesting game.player's turn. Checks if the Guess is valid. If both are correct, it calls the Guards guessCard method.
      Parameters:
      username - The requesting game.player.
      value - The guessed value.

    • stringToValidNumber

      public int stringToValidNumber​(java.lang.String value)
      Is used to get the guessed Value from String to int.
      Parameters:
      value - The Value as String.
      Returns:
      The Value as Int.
